import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; export interface cardData { name: string; img: string; description: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-ama-card', templateUrl: './ama-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ama-card.component.scss'], }) export class AmaCardComponent { @Input() cardData: cardData = { name: '', img: '', description: '', }; }
